name: Mine Run
description:
I released this game back in 2018, on the Amazon App Store:
https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07GL8J2GC/ref=apps_sf_sta

Climb through a gold mine on a very unstable elevator in this pixel-stiled game. The goal: survive the longest and get as many gold as you can! Upgrade your cart across multiple skills and collect all the 10+ skins, plus all the fun new content to be added in the future!

This game includes:
• Simple and enjoyable gameplay
• Upgradable skills
• Customizable character
• GOLD!

NOTE: This game is for Android. You might need to enable App Installations from Unknown Sources before downloading it on your mobile device. To do so, just go to Settings > Security > Unknown Sources (it may differ in some devices).
#arcade
